title: Pixel 2 screen unlocking issues
content: I'm having a few issues with unlocking my screen using my pattern and also dubble tap isn't working All the time... Pulling up to unlock phone also has problems I might have to try about 5 times to get to the pattern unlock and then I have the problem will the pattern unlock it freezes for about 2 seconds and have to attempt again. Just seems since the Android 10 update This is happening... Had my Pixel 2 do nearly 2 years these have been the first problems iv encountered with my phone
